articles.title: Nigeria Losing $56bn Annually to Malnutrition - VP Shettima
articles.summary: Nigeria is losing an estimated $56 billion every year to the devastating impact of malnutrition, Vice President Kashim Shettima has disclosed, describing the crisis as both a human tragedy and an economic threat to the nation's future. Speaking at the High-Level Conference on Mobilising Against Malnutrition in Katsina and the North-West, the Vice President, represented by his Senior Special Adviser on Public Health, Mrs. Uju Vanstatia Rochas-Anwu

articles.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi brings rain and destruction to Vietnam as death toll nears 200
articles.summary: At least five people died in Vietnam after typhoon Kalmaegi pummelled coastal regions with destructive winds and heavy rain, officials said on Friday (November 7, 2025), following the storm's deadly passage through the Philippines , where it killed at least 188 people.
